title: Papa contemplant l'image de son image. (Les Bons Bourgeois), from Le Charivari
marks: Around outside margins in brush and brown watercol along left edge, in brown watercolor: [1865]
description: seated man wearing a black coat and blue checked pants, looking at a picture that he holds; woman wearing a plaid dress and a bonnet holding a child in a pinafore and bonnet standing at right; large, loose, cursive hand-written inscriptions at each edge in margins in brown watercolor
creditline: Gift of Janet H. Spokes in memory of her parents, Angelica and Ignatius Houley
